website_summaries.verdict: A ravishing OLED display and all-new eight-core Core i7 and GeForce RTX 2070 Super components make Gigabyte's 15.6-inch Aero 15 status symbol a top choice for creative pros.
cons: 16GB of RAM and 512GB SSD instead of 32GB and 1TB

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic portable power house.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the intention of using it for some intense CAD design using SolidWorks and for the OLED screen. I have been thoroughly impressed by the performance and so far there have been no hiccups. The display is gorgeous and I can't wait for Windows to properly take advantage of HDR so I can get all the benefits from this laptop. I was pleasantly surprised by the battery life with 'office' applications resulting in a good 6 hours of usage. The only drawback is the fans can get quite loud if you want full performance out of the laptop but the fan profiles are adjustable..
